channel.title: Spirite Help
channel.description:
Ya, I hate custom spirits, but the other ones were plain out...Retarded, so I was going threw, and I wanted to have the original 3 buttons. Public, Trade, and Report Abuse. So I went and found the tutorial and un-Did everything, and Re-Coded it with what should have been the correct thing. now, when I re-added in the Spirit for it, it came out as this. [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5909/0016x.png[/img]
As much as I hate customs, can anyone help me on how to fix this.
Don't post "Fix your spirits" Because this is the correct Spirit size.

item.title: Spirite Help
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Ya, I hate custom spirits, but the other ones were plain out…Retarded, so I was going threw, and I wanted to have the original 3 buttons. Public, Trade, and Report Abuse. So I went and found the tutorial and un-Did everything, and Re-Coded it with what should have been the correct thing. now, when I re-added in the Spirit for it, it came out as this.

As much as I hate customs, can anyone help me on how to fix this.

Don’t post “Fix your spirits” Because this is the correct Spirit size.
